PostToolUse.name: SCSS compilation reminder
PostToolUse.description: Reminds to regenerate assets after SCSS changes

hooks.message: SCSS files modified. Remember to regenerate assets or restart Odoo with --dev=css

PostToolUse.name: JavaScript module check
PostToolUse.description: Checks for proper Odoo module annotation

hooks.message: JavaScript file should start with /** @odoo-module **/ annotation

PostToolUse.name: Theme installation reminder
PostToolUse.description: Reminds to update theme after changes

hooks.message: Theme data modified. Update theme with: python -m odoo -d [DB] -u [theme_module]

PostToolUse.name: Accessibility check
PostToolUse.description: Suggests accessibility review for template changes

hooks.message: Template modified. Consider running accessibility checks (alt attributes, ARIA labels, semantic HTML).
Bootstrap 5 uses start/end instead of left/right. Update classes like 'ms-3' instead of 'ml-3'.

PreCommit.name: Test coverage check
PreCommit.description: Reminds to run tests before committing

hooks.message: Consider running tests before commit: npm test or python -m pytest

PreCommit.name: Performance audit
PreCommit.description: Suggests Lighthouse audit for significant changes

hooks.message: For significant frontend changes, consider running Lighthouse audit for performance metrics.

OnError.name: Owl component error helper
OnError.description: Provides help for Owl component errors

hooks.message: Owl component error detected. Check: 1) Template name matches, 2) Module is properly loaded, 3) Component is registered
Asset error detected. Try: 1) Clear browser cache, 2) Restart Odoo with --dev=all, 3) Check SCSS syntax
